entry.name: romanFontFamily
entry.label: Font family for the roman numerals. e.g 'Serif'. The system font is used if this is not set.

entry.name: arabicFontFamily
entry.label: Font family for the arabic numerals. e.g 'Serif'. The system font is used if this is not set.

entry.name: enableGlowEffect
entry.label: Make the whole dial plate glow.

entry.name: glowSamples
entry.label: How many samples are taken per pixel when edge softening blur calculation is done.

entry.name: glowSpread
entry.label: How large part of the glow color is strengthened near the source edges.
